page.title: 16Kelso Rugby
page.content: My uncle Eric plays rugby for Kelso. Kelso have a very good rugby team. In the team there are four players who have played for Scotland. They are my uncle, Eric Paxton, John Jeffery, Gary Callander,and Roger Baird. Kelso is one of the best rugby teams in the Borders. Kelso RFC play at{Poynder {Park.}There is a rugby pitch, a stand for spectators, a clubhouse where players and members can relax, and floodlights. Kelso have played very well this season. They have won several{Sevens Tournaments.}They have won the Hawick Sevens, Gala Sevens and the Melrose Sevens which is the oldest sevens tournament in the world. Games are usually played on Saturday afternoons. On Sunday mornings younger boys go to Poynder Park to play {mini-rugby.}Rugby is also taught at Kelso High School.
